BECONNECTED

RESOURCES

Parent Heart Watch provides knowledge, support and invaluable resources that can help anyone become a champion of sudden cardiac arrest prevention.

Many of our resources can be downloaded now, or you can submit an online request for materials to be sent to you.
Many materials are free, however, materials with an * indicate there is a cost.
